mainTask.title: HT-030: Universal Consultation Micro-App Template Completion & Production Deployment
mainTask.description:
UNIVERSAL CONSULTATION MICRO-APP COMPLETION: Transform the existing consultation template into a complete, production-ready universal micro-app template that enables rapid client deployment across industries with AI-powered consultation generation, multi-step questionnaire flows, and automated document delivery.

**Mission:** Complete the consultation micro-app template by connecting all existing infrastructure (form system, questionnaire engine, AI consultation generator, PDF export, email delivery, admin UI) into a seamless 3-page workflow: Landing Page → Multi-Step Questionnaire → AI-Generated Consultation Results with automated service package recommendations.

**Scope:** Multi-page flow integration, AI consultation generation enhancement, service package management system, universal template customization, white-labeling capabilities, admin interface for client management, and production deployment pipeline.

**Methodology:** AUDIT → DECIDE → APPLY → VERIFY with 50+ verification checkpoints, comprehensive testing, and surgical integration of existing components.

**Business Impact:**
- Complete universal consultation micro-app template ready for client deployment
- Enable ≤7-day custom consultation app delivery for any industry
- AI-powered consultation generation with personalized service recommendations
- Automated lead qualification and consultation document delivery
- White-labelable template supporting multiple client industries
- Production-ready deployment with comprehensive admin management
mainTask.dependency_status: COMPLETED - All deliverables implemented and tested

success_metrics.ai_integration: Seamless AI consultation generation from questionnaire responses
success_metrics.service_management: Complete admin interface for service package management
success_metrics.white_labeling: Full customization support for different industries
success_metrics.client_management: Complete admin dashboard for client management

subtasks.title: Phase 1: Multi-Page Flow Integration & Data Persistence
subtasks.description: AUDIT & DECIDE: Integrate existing components into seamless 3-page workflow with data persistence, routing, and state management across Landing Page → Questionnaire → Consultation Results.

actions.title: 3-Page Workflow Architecture & Routing System
actions.description: Design and implement 3-page workflow architecture with dynamic routing, data flow between pages, and seamless navigation from landing page through questionnaire to consultation results
pages_to_create: app/consultation/landing/page.tsx - Landing page with lead capture
app/consultation/layout.tsx - Shared layout for consultation workflow
verification_checkpoints: Dynamic routing system implemented with proper navigation
Data flow between pages established and tested
Landing page with lead capture form functional
Questionnaire page with multi-step flow operational
Results page with AI consultation display working
Seamless navigation between all pages validated
Shared layout with consistent branding implemented

actions.title: Data Persistence & State Management Integration
actions.description: Implement comprehensive data persistence system with questionnaire response storage, consultation data management, and cross-page state synchronization
verification_checkpoints: Data persistence system implemented with database integration
API endpoints for data submission functional
Data validation and error handling implemented
State management with proper cleanup and recovery

actions.title: Questionnaire Engine Integration & Customization
actions.description: Integrate existing questionnaire engine with consultation workflow, customize for business consultation needs, and implement dynamic question routing based on responses
verification_checkpoints: Questionnaire engine integrated with consultation workflow
Dynamic question routing based on responses implemented
Questionnaire wrapper component with consultation branding
Question flow optimization for consultation qualification
Custom validation rules for consultation questions
Questionnaire data formatting for AI processing

actions.title: Landing Page Enhancement & Lead Capture Optimization
actions.description: Enhance existing landing page template with consultation-specific content, optimize lead capture forms, and implement conversion tracking
verification_checkpoints: Landing page enhanced with consultation-specific content
Lead capture form optimized for conversion
Call-to-action buttons optimized for questionnaire flow

subtasks.title: Phase 2: AI Consultation Generation & Service Package Management
subtasks.description: APPLY: Enhance AI consultation generation system with service package recommendations, implement service package management interface, and create dynamic consultation report generation.

actions.title: AI Consultation Generation Enhancement & Service Recommendations
actions.description: Enhance existing AI consultation system to generate personalized service recommendations based on questionnaire responses, implement service package matching logic, and create dynamic consultation content
pages_to_create: lib/ai/consultation-prompts.ts - AI prompts for consultation generation
verification_checkpoints: AI consultation generation enhanced with service recommendations
Service package matching logic implemented and tested
AI prompts optimized for consultation quality
Service package scoring and ranking system
AI generation error handling and fallbacks

actions.title: Service Package Management System & Admin Interface
actions.description: Implement comprehensive service package management system with admin interface for creating, editing, and managing service packages, pricing tiers, and consultation offerings
verification_checkpoints: Admin interface for service package creation functional
Service package editor with full CRUD operations
Service package data management system operational
API endpoints for service package management working
Service package validation and error handling
Service package pricing and tier management

actions.title: Dynamic Consultation Report Generation & PDF Enhancement
actions.description: Enhance existing PDF generation system to create dynamic consultation reports with personalized recommendations, service packages, and professional formatting
pages_to_create: lib/pdf/consultation-pdf.ts - Enhanced PDF generation for consultations
verification_checkpoints: Service packages displayed in consultation reports
Consultation report template with dynamic content
Report customization based on client branding
Report data validation and error handling

actions.title: Email Automation & Consultation Delivery System
actions.description: Implement automated email delivery system for consultation reports, follow-up sequences, and client communication with personalized content
verification_checkpoints: Email template customization for client branding
Email delivery error handling and retry logic

subtasks.title: Phase 3: Universal Template Customization & White-Labeling
subtasks.description: APPLY: Implement universal template customization system with white-labeling capabilities, industry-specific configurations, and client branding management.

actions.title: Universal Template System & Industry Configurations
actions.description: Implement universal template system supporting multiple industries with configurable content, industry-specific questionnaires, and customizable service packages

actions.title: White-Labeling System & Client Branding Management
actions.description: Implement comprehensive white-labeling system with client branding management, logo customization, color schemes, and brand asset management
verification_checkpoints: Logo customization and upload system working
Brand consistency across all pages validated

actions.title: Template Customization Interface & Content Management
actions.description: Create comprehensive template customization interface allowing clients to customize content, modify questionnaire questions, and personalize consultation workflows

actions.title: Client Management Dashboard & Multi-Tenant Support
actions.description: Implement comprehensive client management dashboard with multi-tenant support, client analytics, and consultation tracking

subtasks.title: Phase 4: Production Deployment & Comprehensive Testing
subtasks.description: VERIFY: Implement comprehensive testing suite, performance optimization, production deployment pipeline, and complete documentation for the universal consultation micro-app template.

actions.title: Comprehensive Testing Suite & Quality Assurance
actions.description: Implement comprehensive testing suite covering all consultation workflow components, integration testing, and end-to-end user journey validation

actions.title: Performance Optimization & Production Readiness
actions.description: Optimize performance across all consultation workflow components, implement caching strategies, and ensure production-ready performance metrics
verification_checkpoints: Performance optimization implemented across all components
Page load times optimized to <2 seconds
AI generation time optimized to <30 seconds
PDF generation time optimized to <10 seconds
Email delivery time optimized to <5 seconds

actions.title: Production Deployment Pipeline & Infrastructure
actions.description: Implement production deployment pipeline with automated testing, deployment automation, and production infrastructure setup

actions.title: Documentation & Client Handover Package
actions.description: Create comprehensive documentation including user guides, admin documentation, API documentation, and client handover package
verification_checkpoints: Admin documentation with all features covered
API documentation with examples and schemas

phase_1.focus: Multi-page flow integration and data persistence

phase_2.focus: AI consultation generation and service package management

success_criteria.template_completion: 100% functional 3-page consultation workflow with seamless navigation
success_criteria.ai_integration: AI consultation generation with personalized service recommendations
success_criteria.service_management: Complete admin interface for service package management and customization
success_criteria.white_labeling: Full white-labeling support with client branding and industry customization
success_criteria.deployment_readiness: Production-ready deployment with comprehensive testing and documentation
success_criteria.client_management: Complete client management dashboard with analytics and tracking
success_criteria.performance_targets: All performance targets met (page load <2s, AI generation <30s, PDF <10s, email <5s)
success_criteria.universal_applicability: Template works across multiple industries with customizable content and workflows

technical_risks: Integration complexity between existing components may introduce bugs
AI consultation generation quality may vary based on questionnaire responses
Performance optimization may require significant refactoring
White-labeling system may impact template flexibility
mitigation_strategies: Comprehensive integration testing with existing component validation
AI prompt optimization and fallback mechanisms for quality assurance
Performance monitoring and optimization with caching strategies
Modular white-labeling system with template flexibility preservation
